venue.name: Revere Beach (in front of the William G. Reinstein Bandstand, across the road from the T)

item.description: Join us on Sunday - looks to be the better weather of our weekend.  Grab your  cooler and fill with your favorite food, snacks, and drink - ready to share with our Beach Blanket Boomers.  You don't feel comfortable in a bathing suit, well, who does?, Dress for comfort or style, no one cares, just join us for fun at the beach.  Bring your transistor radio or  boom box or  CD player, or IPOD.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Pack a Cooler To Share and Meet Us in Revere!
